 2021-02132021-03-26NR,  CRA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActDisability Tax Credit Promoters Restrictions Act
SubjectDisability Tax Credit Promoters Restrictions Regulations
PrecisDISABILITY TAX CREDIT PROMOTERS RESTRICTIONS REGULATIONS in order to support the implementation of the Act by setting the maximum fee permitted to be charged for services relating to a disability tax credit (DTC) request as a) $100.00 for a DTC request made for a determination of disability tax credit eligibility; or b) $100.00 per taxation year for a DTC request in respect of a deduction for an individual or for a dependent, or in respect of any deduction or overpayment of tax under the Income Tax Act that is contingent upon DTC eligibility for that individual or for a dependant.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0055 Publication Date: 2021-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
